{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7900 |revision=-100NAS (Nighthawk X6) |series=AC3000 |asin=B0106N5OOW |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H315 |manuf_rev=T00 |availability=now |price=250 |est_release_date=06/22/2015 |fcc_date=10/05/2015 |fcc_id=PY314200264 |ic_id=4054A-14200264 |pcb_id=U12H315T00 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG, TT1418 P10, 372829-03 Z1D; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85309-11;;3;,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85710-11;;3;,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 85712, 416S5;3;,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX;PEX8603;PLX, PEX8603-AB50NI G, 1413, 3306D, TAIWAN;1; |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• 2x '''1300''' Mbps - 2x 3-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''450''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''3000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X6 - AC3000 Tri-Band Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7900.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7900}} This is yet another artificially limited Costco exclusive model. :In this case, the R7900 is a [[Netgear R8000|R8000]] with 256QAM disabled :on the three stream 2.4GHz radio limiting its maximum :theoretical speed to 450Mbps instead of 600Mbps. Also, the USB 2.0 port was removed for the R7900. While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device :- all radios (2x 5GHz [an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [bgn]) used are BCM43602 :(''FullMAC'') is supported in the mainline '''Linux''' kernel by [[brcmfmac]] {{See also|Netgear R8000|Foxconn}} ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=64056 ''Netgear R7900'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-r7900.22339/ ''Netgear R7900'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===See also=== :[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[Netgear R7900]] *[[Netgear R7900P]] *[[Netgear R8000]] *[[Netgear R8000P]] __NOTOC__
